review_title: Great Team, Poor HR and onboarding
job_title: Mental Health Therapist in Calgary Woods, TX
pros: I worked with a great and competent team. Everyone was fully supportive and dedicated to their jobs.
cons: HR was poorly run. It took 2 months and multiple hoops to get my prior work experience recognized and have my pay scale adjusted. My position was temporary and after I left, I received a letter (6 months later) from HR saying they had overpaid me and I had 6 weeks to pay back $800+ or they would further escalate to a collections agency.
